title: On the acyclic quantum cluster algebras with principle coefficients
authors: Junyuan Huang, Xueqing Chen, Ming Ding and Fan Xu
abstract:
In this paper, we focus on a new lower bound quantum cluster algebra which is
generated by the initial quantum cluster variables and the quantum projective
cluster variables of an acyclic quantum cluster algebra with principle
coefficients. We show that the new lower bound quantum cluster algebra
coincides with the corresponding acyclic quantum cluster algebra. Moreover, we
establish a class of formulas between these generators, and obtain the dual PBW
basis of this algebra.
